mapper.update: update pq_task_reading_play_log set reading_record_id = #{readingRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chapter_id = #{chapterId}, student_id = #{studentId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, reading_record_id, user_id, created_time,student_id,chapter_id from pq_task_reading_play_log
